front.title: BR Domain Mapping for the Extensible Provisioning Protocol (EPP)

abstract.t: This document describes an Extensible Provisioning Protocol (EPP)extension mapping for the provisioning and management of .br Internetdomain names stored in a shared central repository. Specified inXML, this mapping extends the EPP domain name mapping to provideadditional features required for the provisioning of .br domainnames.
